roleset.name: fall precipitously
roleset.note: PLUNGE-V NOTES: For examples of usage of the higher-numbered Args refer to 'fall' (from plunge.01-v)
PLUNGE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry plunge.01. Corresponds to VN class calibratable_cos-45.6-1. (from plunge.01-n)

role.descr: end point, end state of arg1

example.name: variant
example.text: Japanese intervention has kept [the US currency]-1 from *trace*-1 plunging below key levels against the mark.

example.name: variant
example.text: Japanese intervention has kept [the US currency]-1 from *trace*-1 plunging below key levels against the mark.

example.name: Within LVC - Arg 1 only
example.text: `` You may have to sell your stocks at a time when-2 the market takes a plunge *T*-2 , '' says Mr. Blankenship , a Del Mar , Calif. financial planner .

example.name: With attribute
example.text: Lindsay Williams correctly foretold oil's plunge in price.

example.name: Args 1, 3, 4
example.text: What company -- and what stock -- it's the big winner from the plunge in oil prices from $148 a barrel in July to less than $43 a barrel on Dec. 19.
example.arg: to less than $43 a barrel on Dec. 19.

roleset.name: immerse forcefully, dive into water or metaphorically dive into sth
roleset.note: PLUNGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'plunge' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'fall' (from plunge.02-v predicate notes)
PLUNGE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry plunge.02; corresponds to VN class escape-51.1-2. and meander-47.7 (from plunge.02-n)

example.name: ergative
example.text: "Attention" yelled our pilot as our basket plunged into the canal.

example.name: agentive
example.text: We scuttled along for a few feet before he plunged us into the drink again.

example.name: non-liquid arg2
example.text: I-1 once found myself holding a steak knife - ready *PRO*-1 to plunge it into my chest .

example.name: Agent and plunger conflated in arg0
example.text: His plunge into the pool made a great splash.

example.name: Non-agentive plunger: arg1
example.text: He recalls the majesty of the river's plunge into the abyss.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He began his final plunge of the knife into Jimac's heart.
